summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C) and outside temperature (down 6.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13540 lux) and cloud levels (up 615 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15218 lux) and cloud levels (up 1566 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 614.8m lower than yesterday, 563.8m lower than the past week, 1565.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1109.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
